synopsis.text: Doll ed up in digital form, the Hacka Dolls are the personified AI engines of a popular news app, dedicated to delivering personalized newsfeeds to users based on their interests and reading habits. The trio comprises Hacka Doll #1, the primary navigator and entertainment AI, Hacka Doll #2, the anime connoisseur, and Hacka Doll #3, the otaku with a wealth of knowledge. Despite being deemed substandard due to their quirks, these three digital damsels are dispatched to Earth with a mission: to advance humanity in any way they can, from aiding a fujoshi in selling her doujinshi to performing as idols. Their enthusiasm is unwavering, and they tackle every task with utmost sincerity, proving that even AI can possess a heartfelt desire to help. The Hacka Dolls' voice actresses also lend their talents to the anime's theme song, 'First Heart Beat,' further showcasing their versatility and dedication to their mission.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
